code:
sequenceDiagram participant Core as "kikwi-core
(Logistics_FleetManagement)" participant UoW as "UnitOfWork (Logistics_FleetManagement)" participant Repository as "ProcessExecutionRepository" participant MongoDB as "MongoDB" participant Publisher as "EventPublisher (Logistics_FleetManagement)" Core->>Core: Executa tarefas síncronas... Core->>UoW: new UnitOfWork(Logistics_TrackingNumber) Core->>UoW: Acumula alterações (Logistics_FleetManagement) Note over Core: Fim do bloco síncrono. Core->>+Repository: commit(Logistics_TrackingNumber) Repository->>+MongoDB: INICIAR TRANSAÇÃO MongoDB->>MongoDB: 1. Atualiza ProcessInstance MongoDB->>MongoDB: 2. Cria/Apaga ExecutableTasks MongoDB->>MongoDB: 3. Insere 'criticalEvents' na 'event_outbox' MongoDB-->>-Repository: COMMIT TRANSAÇÃO Repository-->>-Core: Commit bem-sucedido Core->>+Publisher: publishEvents(Logistics_Warehouse)) Publisher-->>-Core: Retorno Imediato
